refnamediv.refpurpose: helper configuration file for generate persistent white and black lists of IP-addresses for &dhlfirehol;.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: &dhname; is an INI file with two sections - lists of IP addresses or domain names:

refsect1.title: FILE FORMAT
refsect1.para: The file consists of sections and parameters. A section begins with the name of the section in square brackets and continues until the next section begins or file ends. Sections contain sequence of "raw" lines, each of which is a unnamed parameter.
Section and parameter names are case sensitive.
Any line beginning with a hash ("#") character is ignored, as are lines containing only whitespace.

refsect1.title: SECTION ipv4White
refsect1.para: [ipv4White] section are given sequence of IP-addresses or host names permitted to WireGuard tunnel.

refsect1.title: SECTION ipv4Black
refsect1.para: [ipv4Black] section are given sequence of IP-addresses or host names forbidden to WireGuard tunnel.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The programs are documented fully by Damir Sh. Yakupov available via the info 1 system.
